Body:
frame_min, frame_max, f_base = 100, 106, '952.mp4'
state = pd.Series([frame_min, frame_max, f_base], index=['stateStart',
    'stateEnd', 'fBase'])
frame_indexes_expected = {(2): [100, 106], (3): [100, 103, 106], (4): [100,
    102, 104, 106]}
for n_frames in [2, 3, 4]:
    frame_indexes = FrameExtractor._pick_frames(state, n_frames=n_frames,
        allow_duplicates=False, random=False)
    self.assertEqual(n_frames, frame_indexes.nunique())
    self.assertListEqual(frame_indexes.tolist(), frame_indexes_expected[
        n_frames])
